thread.title: Watch: Russell Wilson avoids an injury while sliding (video)
thread.title_full: Watch: Russell Wilson avoids an injury while sliding (video) | OregonLive.com

author: Geoffrey C. Arnold | The Oregonian/OregonLive
title: Watch: Russell Wilson avoids an injury while sliding (video)
text:
Seattle Seahawks quarterback Russell Wilson avoided a potentially serious injury Thursday night.
Whether Wilson is running by design or necessity, he's very effective when he does run. He's also smart in knowing when to slide and avoid taking a hit and possibly being injured. He scrambled and tried to slide during the game against San Francisco Thursday night, but the turf produced the best tackle of the night.
Watch
Levi's turf monster strikes again, coming up in bunches on Russell Wilson's slide. pic.twitter.com/tp7NrQ4YNV
â€” KNBR (@KNBR) October 23, 2015
Wilson looked at the turf with a "Did that really happen?" gesture. He's lucky he didn't seriously injure his ankle on leg on the play.
The turf at Levi's Stadium has been criticized this season and there are calls for the league to do something before the stadium hosts Super Bowl 50 in February.
-- Geoffrey C. Arnold | @geoffreyCarnold
